Torleif V
TEFL-certified

Torleif is the founder of Norwegian Square.
He loves teaching Norwegian to his students, and makes sure that all his classes are effective and professional. His lessons are for people of all levels - A1 to C1. If you are starting out right now then this is a great opportunity!

Torleif has made all the teaching material by himself with care and dedication. The resources used are influenced by the well known books: "På Vei", "Stein på Stein" and "Her på Berget". All this is work has been made to make sure that the students can take the B2 test or Bergenstesten in the foreseable future.
